scripts.build-prerelease: npm version prerelease --no-git-tag-version && npm i && ng-packagr -p ng-package.json
scripts.package-prerelease: cd dist/@vidal-community/ng2-discovery && find . -type f -name 'vidal-community-ng2-discovery-*.tgz' -delete && npm pack
scripts.build-and-publish-prerelease: npm run build-prerelease && npm run package-prerelease && npm run publish-prerelease
scripts.package-release: cd dist/@vidal-community/ng2-discovery && find . -type f -name 'vidal-community-ng2-discovery-*.tgz' -delete && npm pack
scripts.build-and-publish-release: npm run build-release && npm run package-release && npm run publish-release
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && npm run build-and-publish-release
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && npm run build-and-publish-release
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm run build-and-publish-release
